Topic Summary: The issue in this appeal is whether the grant by Kerry Co-operative Creameries Limited (hereinafter referred to as “Kerry Co-op”) to the Appellant of a right to subscribe for shares in Kerry Co-op and/or the exercise of that right by the Appellant gave rise to a liability to income tax on the part of the Appellant.
Tax Legislation: Section 18(2) of the Taxes Consolidation Act, 1997; Section 65(1) Taxes Consolidation Act 1997;, Taxes Consolidation Act 1997
